DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , open-label , multicenter , randomize , non comparative study consist two concurrent single-arms . Approximately 160 subject randomize 1:1 ratio Arm 1 ( bevacizumab alone ) Arm 2 ( bevacizumab + irinotecan ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Bevacizumab Alone Combination With Irinotecan Treatment Glioblastoma Multiforme ( BRAIN )
